name: Mech Fighter: Experimental Edition
description:
VS Com - You play as Rebecca, a young mechanic trying to rescue her sentient Mech from the government. She pilots her malfunctioning mech, EDY, to escape the facility. But she runs into her old friend and new recruit to the police force, Keira. Fix jams, repair body parts, and try not to overheat your mech while also fighting against another pilot.

VS Player - Two players are given broken mechs that they must maintain while fighting against each other.

NOTE:
This is more of an experiment than a full game. I wanted to upgrade a gamejam submission I did a while ago: https://zeroelopez.itch.io/mech-fighter. I wanted to add a couple of features as well as add a single player mode so people can enjoy it by themselves.
